<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>
<A NAME="EXH_107_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.7
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	FLUSHING BANK
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	SPECIFIED OFFICER
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	CHANGE IN CONTROL SEVERANCE POLICY
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(AS AMENDED EFFECTIVE JANUARY 1, 2016)
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	1.
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Term; Policy Effectiveness
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(a)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Policy shall apply to each employee
	at the level of Senior Vice President or above in good standing of Flushing Bank (the &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;) (and to each employee
	at the level of Assistant Vice President or above in good standing of the Bank who was a participant in this Policy as in effect
	immediately prior to July 28, 2015) who is not party to an employment agreement with the Bank (an &ldquo;Employee&rdquo;) for the
	period that both (i) such Employee is employed as such and (ii) this Policy is in effect in accordance with Section 1(b) below
	(conjunctively, the &ldquo;Term&rdquo;); provided that if prior to January 1, 2009 such Employee is party to a written Special
	Termination Agreement with the Company, then the term (without renewal) of such agreement shall continue in full force and effect
	until terminated in accordance with the terms thereof and the Term hereof, if applicable, for such Employee shall commence immediately
	upon such termination; and provided further that, notwithstanding the provisions of Section 1(b), the Term shall continue for such
	Employee for a period of two years following a Change in Control (as defined in Section 2(b) below) that otherwise occurs during
	the Term.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;This Policy, as amended effective January
	1, 2016, shall remain in effect through January 1, 2017, and such effectiveness shall be automatically renewed for an additional
	one year period on January 1st, 2017 and on each succeeding January 1st thereafter, unless the Board of Directors or any officer
	of the Bank, acting upon the authority thereof, shall resolve to not renew the Policy as of the next such January 1st; provided
	that such resolution is adopted prior to such anniversary date and the participants under the Policy are notified of such non-renewal
	within 60 days after such anniversary date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(c)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the expiration of the Term, all rights,
	benefits and obligations of Flushing Bank (the &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;) and Flushing Financial Corporation (the &ldquo;Holding Company&rdquo;)
	hereunder shall terminate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;Notwithstanding anything in this Policy
	to the contrary, the amendments to this Policy that became effective July 28, 2015 shall not apply to any employee who was covered
	by this Policy immediately prior to July 28, 2015 (the &ldquo;Grandfathered Employees&rdquo;). The rights of the Grandfathered
	Employees shall continue to be governed by the terms of the Policy as in effect immediately prior to July 28, 2015, except that
	the definition of Change of Control in Section 2(b) below shall be applied in lieu of the definition of Change of Control that
	was in effect immediately prior to July 28, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	2.
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;&ldquo;
<U>
	Cause
</U>
	&rdquo; means the Employee&rsquo;s
	(i) intentional engagement in dishonest conduct or willful misconduct, (ii) breach of fiduciary duty involving personal profit,
	(iii) insubordination or intentional failure to perform stated duties, (iv) willful violation of the Bank&rsquo;s rules and policies
	and other applicable laws, rules, or regulations, (v) conviction (including entry of a guilty or
<I>
	nolo contendere
</I>
	plea) of
	a felony or any crime involving dishonesty or moral turpitude, (vi) material breach of any provision of any Bank policy or employment
	agreement with the Bank, or (vii) poor performance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;&ldquo;
<U>
	Change of Control
</U>
	&rdquo;
	means:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;the acquisition of all or substantially
	all of the assets of the Bank or the Holding Company by any person or entity, or by any persons or entities acting in concert;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;the occurrence of any event
	if, immediately following such event, a majority of the members of the Board of Directors of the Bank or the Holding Company, as
	the case may be, or of any successor corporation shall consist of persons other than Current Members, respectively (for these purposes,
	a &ldquo;Current Member&rdquo; shall mean any member of the Board of Directors of the Bank or the Holding Company as of the Commencement
	Date and any successor of a Current Member whose nomination or election has been approved by a majority of the Current Members
	then on the respective Board of Directors);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(iii)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the acquisition of beneficial
	ownership, directly or indirectly (as provided in Rule 13d-3 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &ldquo;Act&rdquo;),
	or any successor rule), of 25% or more of the total combined voting power of all classes of stock of the Bank or the Holding Company
	by any person or group deemed a person under Section 13(d)(3) of the Act; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(iv)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the consummation of a merger
	or consolidation of the Bank or the Holding Company with another corporation where the stockholders of the Bank or the Holding
	Company, immediately prior to the merger or consolidation, do not beneficially own, directly or indirectly, immediately after the
	merger or consolidation, shares entitling such stockholders to 50% or more of the total combined voting power of all classes of
	stock of the surviving corporation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;&ldquo;
<U>
	Disability
</U>
	&rdquo; means termination
	under circumstances in which the Employee would qualify for disability benefits under one or more disability programs maintained
	by the Holding Company or any subsidiary (including the Bank) employing the Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;&ldquo;
<U>
	Good Reason
</U>
	&rdquo; means:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage164"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(i)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a reduction by the Holding Company
	or any subsidiary (including the Bank) in the Employee&rsquo;s annual base salary as in effect immediately prior to a Change of
	Control; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	(ii)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the failure of the Holding Company
	or any subsidiary (including the Bank) to maintain the Employee&rsquo;s principal place of employment within 50 miles as in effect
	immediately prior to a Change of Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	3.
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Severance Benefits
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	In the event the Employee&rsquo;s employment with
	the Holding Company and any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank) is terminated within two years following a Change of Control
	(i)&nbsp;by the Holding Company or any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank) other than by reason of the death or Disability
	of the Employee and other than for Cause, or (ii)&nbsp;by the Employee for Good Reason, the Bank shall provide and pay to the Employee
	the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	(a)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Employee&rsquo;s earned but
	unpaid current salary as of the date of termination, plus an amount representing any accrued but unpaid vacation time, which amounts
	shall be paid within thirty days of termination;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	(b)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the benefits, if any, to which
	the Employee is entitled as a former employee under the Holding Company&rsquo;s and subsidiaries&rsquo; (including the Bank&rsquo;s)
	employee benefit plans and programs and compensation plans and programs, which shall be paid in accordance with the terms of such
	plans and programs;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	(c)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;continued health and welfare
	benefits (including group life, disability, medical and dental benefits), in addition to that provided in paragraph&nbsp;(b) above,
	to the extent necessary to provide coverage for the Employee for the number of months equal to the number of months of salary payable
	to the Employee pursuant to paragraph&nbsp;(d) below (the &ldquo;Severance Period&rdquo;). Such benefits shall be provided through
	the purchase of insurance, and shall be equivalent to the health and welfare benefits (including cost-sharing percentages)
<B>
</B>
	provided
	to active employees of the Bank (or any successor thereof) as from time to time in effect during the Severance Period. Where the
	amount of such benefits is based on salary, they shall be provided to the Employee based on the highest annual rate of salary achieved
	by the Employee during the period of the Employee&rsquo;s employment with the Bank or its subsidiaries. If the Employee had dependent
	coverage in effect at the time of his or her termination of employment, the Employee shall have the right to elect to continue
	such dependent coverage for the Severance Period. The benefits to be provided under this paragraph (c) shall cease to the extent
	that in the judgment of the Bank substantially equivalent benefits are provided to the Employee (and/or his/her dependents) by
	a subsequent employer of the Employee, who shall certify a description thereof to the Bank; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage165"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	(d)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;within thirty days following
	the Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment, a cash lump sum payment in an amount equal to one month&rsquo;s salary for each
	full year of continuous service completed with the Holding Company or any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank or any predecessor
	of the Bank), but in no event less than 12 months&rsquo; salary or more than 18 months&rsquo; salary, such salary to be the greater
	of the Employee&rsquo;s salary immediately prior to the Change of Control or the Employee&rsquo;s salary at the date of such termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, the benefits provided to the Employee
	under this Section 3 shall be reduced if and to the extent that a nationally recognized firm of compensation consultants or auditors
	designated by the Holding Company or the Bank determines that such reduction will result in a greater net after-tax benefit to
	the Employee than the Employee would obtain in the absence of such reduction, taking into account any excise tax payable by the
	Employee under Internal Revenue Code Section 4999.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Effect on Employee Benefit Plans or Compensation Programs
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Except as expressly provided in this Policy, the
	termination of the Employee&rsquo;s employment, whether by the Holding Company or any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank)
	or by the Employee, shall have no effect on the rights and obligations of the parties hereto under the employee benefit plans or
	programs or compensation plans or programs (whether or not employee benefit plans or programs) that the Holding Company or any
	subsidiary (including the Bank) may maintain from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Right to Employment
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Nothing in this Policy shall be construed as giving
	the Employee the right to be retained in the employment of the Holding Company or any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank),
	nor shall it affect the right of the Holding Company or any of its subsidiaries (including the Bank) to terminate the Employee&rsquo;s
	employment with or without cause.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	6.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Regulatory Action
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(a)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of
	this Policy to the contrary, this Section 6 shall apply at all times, during the Term.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(b)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Employee is suspended and/or temporarily
	prohibited from participating in the conduct of the affairs of the Bank by a notice served under 12 U.S.C. &sect;&nbsp;1818(e)(3)
	and (g)(1), the Bank&rsquo;s obligations to the Employee under this Policy shall be suspended as of the date of such service unless
	stayed by appropriate proceedings. If the charges in such notice are dismissed, the Bank shall (i)&nbsp;pay the Employee all of
	the compensation payable under this Policy that was withheld while the Bank&rsquo;s obligations under this Policy were so suspended,
	and (ii)&nbsp;reinstate in whole any of its obligations to the Employee which were suspended.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage166"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;If the Employee is removed and/or permanently
	prohibited from participating in the conduct of the Bank&rsquo;s affairs by an order issued under 12 U.S.C. &sect;&nbsp;1818(e)(4)
	or (g)(1), all obligations of the Bank to the Employee under this Policy shall terminate as of the effective date of the order,
	other than vested rights of the parties accrued as of such effective date, which shall not be affected.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(d)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Bank is in default (as defined in
	section 3(x)(1) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act (the &ldquo;FDIA&rdquo;)), all obligations of the Bank under this Policy shall
	terminate as of the date of such default, but this Section 6(d) shall not affect any vested rights of the Employee accrued as of
	such date of default.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(e)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All obligations of the Bank under this
	Policy shall be terminated, except to the extent it is determined that continuation of the Policy is necessary to the continued
	operation of the Bank, (i)&nbsp;by the director of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (the &ldquo;FDIC&rdquo;) or his or
	her designee (&ldquo;Director&rdquo;) at the time the FDIC enters into an agreement to provide assistance to or on behalf of the
	Bank under the authority contained in Section 13(c) of the FDIA; or (ii)&nbsp;by the Director at the time the Director approves
	a supervisory merger to resolve problems related to operation of the Bank or when the Bank is determined by the Director to be
	in an unsafe or unsound condition; provided, however, that this Section 6(e) shall not affect any vested rights of the Employee
	accrued as of such date of termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(f)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All obligations under this Policy are further
	subject to such conditions, restrictions, limitations and forfeiture provisions as may separately apply pursuant to any applicable
	state banking laws.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(g)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of
	this Policy to the contrary, any payments made to the Employee pursuant to this Policy or otherwise are subject to and conditioned
	upon their compliance with 12 U.S.C. &sect;&nbsp;1828(k) and any regulations promulgated thereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	7.
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Miscellaneous Provisions
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<U>
	Successors
</U>
	. This Policy shall inure
	to the benefit of and be binding upon the Employee and his legal representatives and the Holding Company and the Bank, their successors
	and assigns, including any successor by merger or consolidation or a statutory receiver or any other person or firm or corporation
	to which all or substantially all of the assets and business of the Holding Company or the Bank may be sold or otherwise transferred.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<U>
	Waiver
</U>
	. The Waiver by any party
	of a breach of any provision of this Policy shall not operate or be construed as a waiver of any subsequent breach of this Policy.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(c)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Severability
</U>
	. The invalidity or
	unenforceability of any provision of this Policy shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision of this
	Policy, which shall remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
	&#9;
<U>
	Headings and References
</U>
	. The headings of the sections of this Policy are inserted for convenience only and shall
	not be deemed to constitute a part of this Policy.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<U>
	Entire Policy
</U>
	. This Policy constitutes
	the entire policy, agreement and understanding of the parties with respect to the matters contemplated herein, and supersedes all
	prior policies, agreements, arrangements and understandings related to the subject matter hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(f)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Amendment or Termination
</U>
	. The Board
	of Directors of the Bank may amend or terminate this Policy at any time prior to a Change of Control. This Policy may not be amended
	or terminated at any time after a Change of Control in any manner adverse to the Employee without the consent of such Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<U>
	Governing Law
</U>
	. This Policy shall
	be governed by the laws of the State of New York, without reference to conflicts of law principles.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<U>
	Withholding
</U>
	. The Employee agrees
	that the Bank may withhold from any payment required to be made to the Employee pursuant to this Policy all federal, state, local
	and/or other taxes which the Bank determines are required to be withheld in accordance with applicable statutes and/or regulations
	in effect from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	8.
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Guarantee
</U>
	.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Holding Company hereby agrees to guarantee
	the payment by the Bank of any benefits and compensation to which the Employee is entitled under this Policy.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	9.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;
<B>
<U>
	Compliance with Code Section 409A
</U>
	.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(a)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the provisions of section
	3, if the Employee is a specified employee within the meaning of Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended
	(&ldquo;Section 409A&rdquo;), as determined by the Board in accordance with the election made by the Bank for determining specified
	employees, any amounts payable under sections 3(d) (and any other payments to which the Employee may be entitled) which constitute
	&ldquo;deferred compensation&rdquo; within the meaning of Section 409A and which are otherwise scheduled to be paid during the
	first six months following the Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (other than any payments that are permitted under Section
	409A to be paid within six months following termination of employment of a specified employee) shall be suspended until the six-month
	anniversary of the Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (or the Employee&rsquo;s death if sooner), at which time all payments
	that were suspended shall be paid to the Employee (or his estate) in a lump sum, together with interest on each suspended payment
	at the prime rate (as reported in the Wall Street Journal) from the date of suspension to the date of payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9;A termination of employment shall not be
	deemed to have occurred for purposes of any provision of this Policy providing for the payment of any amounts or benefits upon
	or following a termination of employment unless such termination is also a &ldquo;separation from service&rdquo; (within the meaning
	of Code Section 409A).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(c)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of Section 409A, each payment
	under sections 3(d) will be treated as a separate payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 1IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(d)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is intended that this Policy comply
	with the provisions of Section 409A and the regulations and guidance of general applicability issued thereunder so as to not subject
	the Employee to the payment of additional interest and taxes under Section 409A, and in furtherance of this intent, this Policy
	shall be interpreted, operated and administered in a manner consistent with these intentions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_10>

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage169"></A>
<A NAME="EXH_108_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.8
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	EMPLOYEE SEVERANCE COMPENSATION PLAN
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	FOR VICE PRESIDENTS AND ASSISTANT VICE PRESIDENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	OF
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<BR>
	FLUSHING BANK
<BR>
<BR>
	(Amended and restated effective as of January 1, 2016)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	1.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	PURPOSE. The purpose of this Employee Severance Compensation Plan for Vice Presidents and Assistant Vice Presidents (the
	&ldquo;Plan&rdquo;) is to provide an equitable measure of compensation for eligible employees of Flushing Bank (the &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;)
	or Flushing Financial Corporation (the &ldquo;Holding Company&rdquo;) whose employment has been terminated within one year after
	a Change of Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	2.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	DEFINITIONS.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Cause&rdquo; means intentional engagement in dishonest conduct, insubordination, willful misconduct, breach of fiduciary
	duty involving personal profit, intentional failure to perform duties, or commission of an act which would constitute a felony.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Change of Control&rdquo; means:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(i)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the acquisition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Bank or the Holding Company by any person or entity, or
	by any persons or entities acting in concert;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(ii)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the occurrence of any event if, immediately following such event, a majority of the members of the Board of Directors of
	the Bank or the Holding Company or of any successor corporation shall consist of persons other than Current Members (for these
	purposes, a &ldquo;Current Member&rdquo; shall mean any member of the Board of Directors of the Bank or the Holding Company as
	of the Effective Date of the Conversion and any successor of a Current Member whose nomination or election has been approved by
	a majority of the Current Members then on the Board of Directors);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(iii)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the acquisition of beneficial ownership, directly or indirectly (as provided in Rule 13d-3 under the Securities Exchange
	Act of 1934 (the &ldquo;Act&rdquo;), or any successor rule), of 25% or more of the total combined voting power of all classes of
	stock of the Bank or the Holding Company by any person or group deemed a person under Section 13(d)(3) of the Act; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(iv)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the consummation of a merger or consolidation of the Bank or the Holding Company with another corporation where the stockholders
	of the Bank or the Holding Company, immediately prior to the merger or consolidation, do not beneficially own, directly or indirectly,
	immediately after the merger or consolidation, shares entitling such stockholders to 50% or more of the total combined voting power
	of all classes of stock of the surviving corporation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage170"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Disability&rdquo; means termination under circumstances in which the employee would qualify for disability benefits
	under one or more disability programs maintained by the Holding Company or the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(d)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Good Reason&rdquo; means (i) a reduction by the Bank or the Holding Company in the employee&rsquo;s Pay, as in effect
	immediately prior to a Change of Control, or (ii) the failure of the Bank or Holding Company to maintain the employee&rsquo;s principal
	place of employment within 50 miles, as in effect immediately prior to a Change of Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Pay&rdquo; means the regular hourly wage of an employee or, if the employee is salaried, the annual base salary of
	the employee, as in effect immediately prior to a Change of Control, and does not include in either case overtime, bonuses, or
	other premium wage payments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	3.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	ELIGIBILITY. An employee shall be eligible to receive the severance payment described in Section 4 of this Plan if:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee was employed by the Bank or the Holding Company immediately prior to a Change of Control at the level of Vice
	President or Assistant Vice President,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee is not (i) a party to an employment agreement nor a special termination agreement with the Bank or the Holding
	Company (ii) or eligible to receive benefits under the Flushing Bank Specified Officer Change in Control Severance Policy, on the
	date of termination of the employee&rsquo;s employment,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee completed at least one year of service with the Bank or the Holding Company prior to termination of the employee&rsquo;s
	employment,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(d)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee&rsquo;s employment was terminated within one year following a Change of Control, and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee&rsquo;s employment was terminated (i)&nbsp;by the Bank or the Holding Company other than by reason of the death,
	or Disability of the employee and other than for Cause, or (ii)&nbsp;by the employee for Good Reason.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	4.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	BENEFITS.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Employees eligible pursuant to Section&nbsp;3 shall be entitled to receive from the Bank a cash lump sum severance payment
	equal to one month Pay for each full year of continuous service completed with the Bank or the Holding Company or any predecessor
	of the Bank, up to a maximum benefit of 12 months of Pay, which shall be paid within thirty days of the Employee&rsquo;s termination
	of employment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	The severance payment described above in paragraph (a) shall be payable in addition to, and not in lieu of, all other accrued
	or vested or earned but deferred compensation, rights, options, or other benefits which may be owed to the employee following termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage171"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Employees eligible pursuant to Section 3 shall be entitled to receive from the Bank continued health and welfare benefits
	(including group life, disability, medical and dental benefits) to the extent necessary to provide coverage for the Employee for
	the number of months equal to the number of months of Pay payable to the Employee pursuant to paragraph (a) above (the &ldquo;Severance
	Period&rdquo;). Such benefits shall be provided through the purchase of insurance, and shall be equivalent to the health and welfare
	benefits (including cost-sharing percentages)
<B>
</B>
	provided to active employees of the Bank (or any successor thereof) as from
	time to time in effect during the Severance Period. Where the amount of such benefits is based on salary, they shall be provided
	to the Employee based on the highest annual rate of salary achieved by the Employee during the period of the Employee&rsquo;s employment
	with the Bank or its subsidiaries. If the Employee had dependent coverage in effect at the time of his or her termination of employment,
	the Employee shall have the right to elect to continue such dependent coverage for the Severance Period. The benefits to be provided
	under this paragraph (c) shall cease to the extent that in the judgment of the Bank substantially equivalent benefits are provided
	to the Employee (and/or his/her dependents) by a subsequent employer of the Employee, who shall certify a description thereof to
	the Bank
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(d)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	No employee shall be required to mitigate, by seeking employment or otherwise, the amount of any payment that the Bank becomes
	obligated to make under this Plan, and amounts to be paid to an employee pursuant to this Plan shall not be reduced by reason of
	the employee&rsquo;s obtaining other employment or receiving similar payments or benefits from another employer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	5.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	WITHHOLDING. The Bank shall have the right to deduct from all payments under this Plan any taxes required by law to be withheld
	from such payments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	6.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	NO RIGHT TO EMPLOYMENT. Nothing in this Plan shall be construed as giving any person the right to be retained in the employment
	of the Bank or the Holding Company, nor shall it affect the right of the Bank or the Holding Company to terminate an employee&rsquo;s
	employment with or without Cause.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	7.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION. The Board of Directors of the Bank may amend or terminate this Plan at any time prior to a Change
	of Control. This Plan may not be amended or terminated at any time after a Change of Control in any manner adverse to an employee
	without the consent of such employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	8.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	NONASSIGNABILITY. Benefits under this Plan may not be assigned by the employee. The terms and conditions of this Plan shall
	be binding on the successors and assigns of the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	9.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	SEVERABILITY. In the event that any provision of this Plan shall be held to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason,
	in whole or in part, the remaining provisions of this Plan shall be unaffected thereby and shall remain in full force and effect
	to the fullest extent permitted by law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	10.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	CONSTRUCTION. The Board of Directors of the Bank shall have sole and full authority to interpret and construe this Plan.
	Any such interpretation or construction shall be final and conclusive.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage172"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	11.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	GOVERNING LAW. This Plan shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York, without reference to conflicts of law principles.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	12.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	GUARANTEE. The Holding Company shall guarantee the payment by the Bank of any benefits to which an employee is entitled
	under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	13.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	EFFECTIVE DATE. The Plan originally became effective as of July 28, 2015. This amendment and restatement of the Plan shall
	be effective as of January 1, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	14.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	COMPLIANCE WITH SECTION 409A
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 4 of this Plan, if the employee is a specified employee within the meaning of
	Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (&ldquo;Section 409A&rdquo;), as determined by the Board of Directors
	of the Bank in accordance with the election made by the Bank for determining specified employees, any amounts payable under Section
	4 of this Plan which constitute &ldquo;deferred compensation&rdquo; within the meaning of Section 409A and which are otherwise
	scheduled to be paid during the first six months following the employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (other than any payments
	that are permitted under Section 409A to be paid within six months following termination of employment of a specified employee)
	shall be suspended until the six-month anniversary of the employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (or the employee&rsquo;s death
	if sooner), at which time all payments that were suspended shall be paid to the employee (or her estate) in a lump sum, together
	with interest on each suspended payment at the prime rate (as reported in the Wall Street Journal) from the date of suspension
	to the date of payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	A termination of employment shall not be deemed to have occurred for purposes of any provision of this Plan providing for
	the payment of any amounts or benefits upon or following a termination of employment unless such termination is also a &ldquo;separation
	from service&rdquo; (within the meaning of Code Section 409A).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	It is intended that this Plan comply with the provisions of Section 409A and the regulations and guidance of general applicability
	issued thereunder so as to not subject the employee to the payment of additional interest and taxes under Section 409A, and in
	furtherance of this intent, this Plan shall be interpreted, operated and administered in a manner consistent with these intentions.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_10>

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage173"></A>
<A NAME="EXH_109_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.9
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	EMPLOYEE SEVERANCE COMPENSATION PLAN
<BR>
	OF
<BR>
	FLUSHING BANK
<BR>
<BR>
	(Amended and restated effective as of January 1, 2016)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	1.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	PURPOSE. The purpose of this Employee Severance Compensation Plan (the &ldquo;Plan&rdquo;) is to provide an equitable measure
	of compensation for eligible employees of Flushing Bank (the &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;) or Flushing Financial Corporation (the &ldquo;Holding
	Company&rdquo;) whose employment has been terminated within one year after a Change of Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	2.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	DEFINITIONS.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Cause&rdquo; means intentional engagement in dishonest conduct, insubordination, willful misconduct, breach of fiduciary
	duty involving personal profit, intentional failure to perform duties, or commission of an act which would constitute a felony.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Change of Control&rdquo; means:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(i)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the acquisition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Bank or the Holding Company by any person or entity, or
	by any persons or entities acting in concert;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(ii)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the occurrence of any event if, immediately following such event, a majority of the members of the Board of Directors of
	the Bank or the Holding Company or of any successor corporation shall consist of persons other than Current Members (for these
	purposes, a &ldquo;Current Member&rdquo; shall mean any member of the Board of Directors of the Bank or the Holding Company as
	of the Effective Date of the Conversion and any successor of a Current Member whose nomination or election has been approved by
	a majority of the Current Members then on the Board of Directors);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(iii)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the acquisition of beneficial ownership, directly or indirectly (as provided in Rule 13d-3 under the Securities Exchange
	Act of 1934 (the &ldquo;Act&rdquo;), or any successor rule), of 25% or more of the total combined voting power of all classes of
	stock of the Bank or the Holding Company by any person or group deemed a person under Section 13(d)(3) of the Act; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(iv)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the consummation of a merger or consolidation of the Bank or the Holding Company with another corporation where the stockholders
	of the Bank or the Holding Company, immediately prior to the merger or consolidation, do not beneficially own, directly or indirectly,
	immediately after the merger or consolidation, shares entitling such stockholders to 50% or more of the total combined voting power
	of all classes of stock of the surviving corporation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Effective Date of the Conversion&rdquo; means the day on which the conversion of the Bank from the mutual to capital
	stock form of ownership becomes effective.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage174"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(d)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Disability&rdquo; means termination under circumstances in which the employee would qualify for disability benefits
	under one or more disability programs maintained by the Holding Company or the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Good Reason&rdquo; means (I) a reduction by the Bank or the Holding Company in the employee&rsquo;s Pay, as in effect
	immediately prior to a Change of Control, or (ii) the failure of the Bank or Holding Company to maintain the employee&rsquo;s principal
	place of employment within 50 miles, as in effect immediately prior to a Change of Control.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(f)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&ldquo;Pay&rdquo; means the regular hourly wage of an employee or, if the employee is salaried, the annual base salary of
	the employee, as in effect immediately prior to a Change of Control, and does not include in either case overtime, bonuses, or
	other premium wage payments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	3.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	ELIGIBILITY. An employee shall be eligible to receive the severance payment described in Section 4 of this Plan if:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee was employed by the Bank or the Holding Company immediately prior to a Change of Control at the level of Assistant
	Secretary or below,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee is not a party to an employment agreement nor a special termination agreement with the Bank or the Holding
	Company on the date of termination of the employee&rsquo;s employment,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee completed at least one year of service with the Bank or the Holding Company prior to termination of the employee&rsquo;s
	employment,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(d)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee&rsquo;s employment was terminated within one year following a Change of Control, and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	the employee&rsquo;s employment was terminated (i)&nbsp;by the Bank or the Holding Company other than by reason of the death,
	or Disability of the employee and other than for Cause, or (ii)&nbsp;by the employee for Good Reason.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	4.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	BENEFITS.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Employees eligible pursuant to Section&nbsp;3 shall be entitled to receive from the Bank a cash lump sum severance payment
	equal to two weeks of Pay for each full year of continuous service completed with the Bank or the Holding Company or any predecessor
	of the Bank, up to a maximum benefit of 26&nbsp;weeks of Pay, which shall be paid within thirty days of the Employee&rsquo;s termination
	of employment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(b)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	The severance payment described above in paragraph (a) shall be payable in addition to, and not in lieu of, all other accrued
	or vested or earned but deferred compensation, rights, options, or other benefits which may be owed to the employee following termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(c)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	No employee shall be required to mitigate, by seeking employment or otherwise, the amount of any payment that the Bank becomes
	obligated to make under this Plan, and amounts to be paid to an employee pursuant to this Plan shall not be reduced by reason of
	the employee&rsquo;s obtaining other employment or receiving similar payments or benefits from another employer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage175"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	5.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	WITHHOLDING. The Bank shall have the right to deduct from all payments under this Plan any taxes required by law to be withheld
	from such payments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	6.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	NO RIGHT TO EMPLOYMENT. Nothing in this Plan shall be construed as giving any person the right to be retained in the employment
	of the Bank or the Holding Company, nor shall it affect the right of the Bank or the Holding Company to terminate an employee&rsquo;s
	employment with or without Cause.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	7.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION. The Board of Directors of the Bank may amend or terminate this Plan at any time prior to a Change
	of Control. This Plan may not be amended or terminated at any time after a Change of Control in any manner adverse to an employee
	without the consent of such employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	8.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	NONASSIGNABILITY. Benefits under this Plan may not be assigned by the employee. The terms and conditions of this Plan shall
	be binding on the successors and assigns of the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	9.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	SEVERABILITY. In the event that any provision of this Plan shall be held to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason,
	in whole or in part, the remaining provisions of this Plan shall be unaffected thereby and shall remain in full force and effect
	to the fullest extent permitted by law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	10.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	CONSTRUCTION. The Board of Directors of the Bank shall have sole and full authority to interpret and construe this Plan.
	Any such interpretation or construction shall be final and conclusive.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	11.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	GOVERNING LAW. This Plan shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York, without reference to conflicts of law principles.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	12.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	GUARANTEE. The Holding Company shall guarantee the payment by the Bank of any benefits to which an employee is entitled
	under this Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	13.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	EFFECTIVE DATE. This Plan originally became effective as of the Effective Date of the Conversion and was subsequently amended
	and restated. This amendment and restatement of the Plan shall be effective as of January 1, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	14.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	COMPLIANCE WITH SECTION 409A
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	(a)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 4 of this Plan, if the employee is a specified employee within the meaning of
	Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (&ldquo;Section 409A&rdquo;), as determined by the Board of Directors
	of the Bank in accordance with the election made by the Bank for determining specified employees, any amounts payable under Section
	4 of this Plan which constitute &ldquo;deferred compensation&rdquo; within the meaning of Section 409A and which are otherwise
	scheduled to be paid during the first six months following the employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (other than any payments
	that are permitted under Section 409A to be paid within six months following termination of employment of a specified employee)
	shall be suspended until the six-month anniversary of the employee&rsquo;s termination of employment (or the employee&rsquo;s death
	if sooner), at which time all payments that were suspended shall be paid to the employee (or her estate) in a lump sum, together
	with interest on each suspended payment at the prime rate (as reported in the Wall Street Journal) from the date of suspension
	to the date of payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
